title: Champion Mastery grades still unclear
body:
http://i.imgur.com/ULbENr3.png

I know grades are based on comparisons with the rest of the people who play the champ.  That's also what this comparison does.  Is this just a "Third parties aren't representative..." type thing?  Because when I saw "A" for this Lucian game, it didn't make much sense, especially with how much weight is seemingly put on CS.

replies.body:
third party thing.

the actual is based on a mix of kda, cs, game duration, and other misc herbs and spices that I can't fathom, as well as having a role to character relation.

Edit. Forgot wards, that's part of it.

> [{quoted}](name=macromite,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=PsqL1UA2,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-02T04:59:40.541+0000)
>
> third party thing.
> 
> the actual is based on a mix of kda, cs, game duration, and other misc herbs and spices that I can't fathom, as well as having a role to character relation.

Duration is typically just for CS though, isn't it?  9.0 KDA, 10 cs/minute wouldn't lower the ranking.  I had the same wards/minute in the 'S' Trundle game as well.

duration has to deal with the whole package. if it's a 40 minute game and you're kda is 1:0:1, that will hurt your score. high cs scores balance it out of course, so don't let it stop you from farming if that's what it takes.

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2204625887?tab=stats

You had less than 50% team kill participation. Your cs was good, you definitely could have warded more. Biggest issue is likely the participation. And as always, the disclaimer: You are compared to other Lucians in the marksmen role, not other champions.
